mapper.select: SELECT B.BASKET_NUM, B.BASKET_PRONUM, B.BASKET_MEM_NUM, B.BASKET_SHOP_NUM, B.BASKET_SIZE, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_BRAND, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NAME, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_MODEL, TG.TOTAL_GOODS_PRICE, S.SHOP_NUM, S.SHOP_NAME, S.SHOP_ADD, GI.GOODS_IMAGE_STD, BR.BRAND_NAME FROM TOTAL_GOODS TG, SHOP S, BASKET B, GOODS_IMAGE GI, BRAND BR WHERE TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM = B.BASKET_PRONUM AND B.BASKET_SHOP_NUM = S.SHOP_NUM AND TG.TOTAL_GOODS_NUM = GI.GOODS_IMAGE_PARENT AND TG.TOTAL_GOODS_BRAND = BR.BRAND_NUM AND TG.TOTAL_GOODS_DEL_GB = 'N' AND B.BASKET_MEM_NUM = #{BASKET_MEM_NUM} AND B.BASKET_DEL_GB = 'N' AND S.SHOP_DEL_GB = 'N' AND GI.GOODS_IMAGE_ORDER = 1
